author: andschwa
body: @daxian-dbw, @mirichmo, and I need to follow up with @piotrpMSFT etc. from .NET Core / CLI for our potential use of the [.NET Core shared host](https://dotnet.github.io/docs/core-concepts/app-types.html).

title: Follow up with .NET Core and shared host
